tool_description: The Vectorspace AI API returns JSON data with a summary of cryptocurrency news, whitepapers, websites or any other context with optional context control, powered by AI.
name: Vectorspace AI Summarizer
title: Vectorspace AI Summarizer

api_list.name: /recommend/app/summarize

required_parameters.name: vxv_token_addr
required_parameters.description: Your Ethereum wallet address containing VXV tokens.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: You can replace text with any URL or text you want.
